item.title: Some thoughts on feedback
item.description: My job as a manager is to continuously provide feedback, and it always helps to improve on technique or remind myself of how to give and receive feedback properly. Recently, I went through a session with my colleagues about giving and receiving feedback. We talked about the importance of calibrating views on ourselves and others, and how feedback reduces potential blind spots. Group discussed the sandwich technique, wrap technique, and how giving options to the receiver improves the probability of achieving the desired effect.
